ygData.subject: Bug in Reaction::operator==
ygData.msgSnippet: Hello, When parsing the chemical mechanism, Cantera wrongly marks these reactions as duplicate: CH2OH+CH3O CH2O+CH3OH CH2O+CH3OH=CH2OH+CH2OH Quick look in

Hello,
When parsing the chemical mechanism, Cantera wrongly marks these 
re=
actions as duplicate:
CH2OH+CH3O<=3D>CH2O+CH3OH
CH2O+CH3OH=3DCH2OH+CH2OH
Qu=
ick look in the source shows that the operator Reaction=A1=CBoperator=3D=3D=
 is 
implemented without taking into account the possibility that the 
reac=
tion equation can contain the same substances (as the second 
reaction in t=
he example). Unfortunately, it seems for me that fixing 
this bug is only p=
ossible by completely rewriting Reaction=A1=CBoperator=3D=3D.

Best regards=
, Anatoli
